author: dgaudet
msg: Fix various parsing bugs with <Dir/Loc/Files> sections.  Improve the
error messages generated.  Introduced cmd->end_token to make it easier
to do nested sections with proper error reporting.  (Note that it can't
be used for <IfModule> or <Limit> unfortunately.)
PR#379: <Files> is not allowed within <Location> because it has no effect.
PR#1817: Change <Files> to work with basenames only.  This fixes both
the bug introduced by the wildcarding change (* doesn't match /) and
bugs such as <Files a*b> not working.

author: dgaudet
msg: Fix various parsing bugs with <Dir/Loc/Files> sections.  Improve the
error messages generated.  Introduced cmd->end_token to make it easier
to do nested sections with proper error reporting.  (Note that it can't
be used for <IfModule> or <Limit> unfortunately.)
PR#379: <Files> is not allowed within <Location> because it has no effect.
PR#1817: Change <Files> to work with basenames only.  This fixes both
the bug introduced by the wildcarding change (* doesn't match /) and
bugs such as <Files a*b> not working.

author: rse
msg: Just the entry for the Makefile.tmpl changes

author: rse
msg: - also remove backup files (*.bak) on "clean" target
- remove the (for a long-time) obsolete "dist.tar" target
because we already use the step-by-step document for
building releases and this particular "dist.tar" target
is at least broken because of the changed subdir/files tree
